name: Interior Design
prompt: Add modern furniture to this empty room, including a cozy gray sofa, a wooden coffee table, and some green plants.

name: Comic Book Cover
prompt: Turn this photo into the style of a vintage comic book cover, with halftone dots, bold title text, and dramatic colors.

name: Colorize Old Photo
prompt: Colorize this black and white photo with realistic, natural colors to make it look like a modern color photograph.

name: Photorealistic Portrait
prompt: Transform this anime character into a photorealistic portrait with realistic skin texture, detailed hair, and lifelike lighting and shadows.

name: Pixel Art Style
prompt: Convert this image into a 16-bit pixel art style, characteristic of classic video games. Use a limited color palette and clearly defined pixel clusters.

name: Die-Cut Sticker
prompt: Turn the main subject of this image into a die-cut vinyl sticker with a thick white border and a subtle drop shadow. The background should be a clean, solid light gray.
